website_summaries.verdict: Favorite of advanced yoga practitioners who practice in hot temps.
pros: Bikram and hot yoga reviewers consistently report this is the best investment in yoga gear they've made
Perfect for holding long poses when your hands and feet start pouring sweat
cons: Some say it slips a little bit, but works better than nothing or some other yoga towels

customer_reviews.title: There is not rubber backing so the towel moved around ...
customer_reviews.text: There is not rubber backing so the towel moved around throughout the class and was a big distraction from my practice. I bought new towels with the rubber backing and it makes a huge difference. This is just a regular towel.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Update 12/13/2019 Were were initially excited about the softness of this towel but after a bit of use and wash, it lost its softness. Further, the towel bunches up and doesn’t stay in place during use. I used a terry cloth beach towel was better served. Also don’t believe all the 5 star reviews. If you buy a towel, they’ll ask you to rate them on Amazon for a free towel. I wouldn’t expect a free towel with a negative review.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Catches everything in laundry
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the material of this towel is soft but I question it's absorbency as my yoga mat is always pretty wet when I do hot yoga. The towel also catches everything in the laundry from other items so you'd have to hand wash this I guess which I don't have time for. I think a different kind of material would be best and will be using this towel as a back-up since I can't return it at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great Hot Yoga Towel
customer_reviews.text: I found that right off the bat (before it really got wet) the towel gripped my yoga mat well, and its grip only got better as it got more sweaty. It is still, however, soft to the touch and very absorbent. Even as guy who sweats profusely, the area around my mat was dry at the end of even one the harder hot flows that I have done. It's a great size and fits most any mat I have seen with an inch or two to spare on the sides. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carl K.

customer_reviews.title: My feet keep slipping on this towel.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really impressed. I've used this towel in a hot yoga class, a gentle yoga class and 3 vinyasa classes. It's too short to cover my whole mat and I keep having to move it around. It's also not as grippy as I need it to be. My feet keep slipping in down dog, defeating the whole reason why I bought this towel. Three stars because it helps absorb the sweat, but I'm not really satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga towel.
customer_reviews.text: I am fairly new to yoga and this towel sure is nice to cover the mats from the health club..... never know how (not) clean they are. Better than bringing and moving towels from the gym all over their mats. It sticks to the mat very well. The only issue I have is that my feet slide on this towel. I found that if I just squirt a little water down from my water bottle the issue is solved.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived just in time!
customer_reviews.text: I started yoga one week ago and could not believe how much sweat accumulated on my yoga mat so I went online and if the reading the reviews on this product I ordered one. It arrived just hours before my 1st "hot" yoga class at 8:45 p.m. last night and it worked unbelievably well. I am shocked at how much a human being can sweat in an hour of yoga but I will say that this towel performed unbelievably well. It absorbed everything, it stayed in place and I was not slipping on my mat as had happened earlier in the week.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The towel works well. I was trying to do hot pilates without a towel and it was quite difficult. This towel didn't slip and absorbed moisture well. The customer service was excellent. The product had shipped the day after I ordered, but was lost by Amazon's delivery service. Even though the fault was Amazon's and the refund and replacement were handled through Amazon's customer service, Yoga Mate contacted me almost immediately to make sure the problem had been rectified and that I was satisfied with the resolution.They then followed up again to confirm that the replacement had been received.
customer_reviews.author: Gregorus S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Hot Yoga
customer_reviews.text: I used to use just regular beach towels for Hot Yoga and my feet would always keep slipping, my sweat would soak through to my mat. This towel so amazing! It absorbs all the water and sweat, you're able to keep traction throughout the class and so easy to clean. It is so soft even after all the times I have used it. This towel is lighter then any other towels I have!
customer_reviews.author: Hill

customer_reviews.title: Ripped within two uses
customer_reviews.text: It had a tacky feeing to it when brand new I soaked through it really quick which was disappointing, but it didn't slip. I washed it on gentle and hung it to dry as instructed and the second time it was less tacky feeling. It still stuck fine but didn’t seem to fit my mat as well. Washed as instructed again and noticed a huge run in the fabric right down the middle. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: KiloAlpha831

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not a non-slip yoga towel!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for my hot yoga class since it was recommended by Amazon and saw all the good reviews. I am so disappointed and less trusting of the reviews on Amazon now. I'm beginning to think that the reviews on Amazon are mostly fake. This makes it difficult to know whether the product is high quality or not. I was hoping to get a non-slip yoga towel to use for my hot yoga class, but this towel is definitely not a non-slip! It doesn't grip the yoga mat. It was slipping all over the places and I have to constantly adjust it. So annoying. The description is very misleading. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great Towel But. . .
customer_reviews.text: The towel is great. However, with the towel came a notice that if you love using the towel you can go to the website after using the towel a few times and they will send you another free towel. I went to the website just a few weeks after receiving the towel I purchased. It said they ran out of towels so the promotion is over, however, they will give me a discount if I want to buy more towels. To me that was their way of just getting me to buy more towels. What a shame! If they are going to do a promotion then they should have an end date on the literature. Otherwise it's false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: FrequentBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Very multi-purposeful!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if "multi-purposeful" is a word, but I literally use this towel for EVERYTHING! Of course it works perfectly for yoga/hot yoga, but I also use it at the beach, for picnics, when I bathe my dog (yikes), I've kept it in the car before to use after long hikes or after taking the kids to the splash pads! This towel certainly serves its purpose and more! Couldn't be or satisfied in the quality or customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Reagan M.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expensive versions
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel, has a "stickier" feel than more expensive yoga towels I've bought that are the same brand as my expensive mat (which is allegedly supposed to make them slip less) so that I don't slide around at all when doing sweatier yoga. So far washes great. Best money I've spent.
customer_reviews.author: CelineS

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hot Yoga
customer_reviews.text: I bought this towel for hot yoga and it hasn't disappointed. I was using lightweight microfiber towels on the mat previously. However, I found out the hard way that if you practice without a shirt (I'm a dude), it will make a wet seal with your back and make some serious fart sounds. Not exactly what I was going for in a room of women. With this towel, I still get the absorption, but without the sound effects.
customer_reviews.author: Two Picky Shoppers

customer_reviews.title: The new improved yoga mate is AWESOME!!!! LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I would ABSOLUTELY RECOMMEND THIS TOWEL. I sweat a lot during my workouts and need a towel that will grip well so I can hold the pose without slipping. The original towel I received was not impressive at all, it shrunk after the first washing and hang dry and there really was not grip factor to it. The company had AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE and completely refunded the towel AND replaced it with an improved towel. They took responsibility for the manufacturing mishap of the first towel and did the "right thing" for the customer by issuing a refund and a replacement towel for my hassles!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Aschenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and absorbant
customer_reviews.text: I recently started doing hot yoga and decided to try this towel. It fits my yoga mat perfectly and is super soft and absorbant as I tend to sweat alot. I also love the bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: JSR

customer_reviews.title: Great looking towel that fits my Gaiam mat perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two towels and the delivery was correct and arrived on time. The towels look great with the simple grey design with colored stitched trim. They need to be washed before for the first use as they are somewhat slippery out of the box. I use vinegar instead of fabric softener so the towels are soft but not slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great towel for hot yoga.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this towel for Christmas and it is perfect. It is soft and fits the yoga mat size. It washed up well and held its softness and shape. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Crow63

customer_reviews.title: Slides during poses, disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the absorbency initially, but after a couple of washes, it is really sliding during yoga. I am not very pleased with the slickness while trying to hold a pose.
customer_reviews.author: T. Utz

customer_reviews.title: Very thick
customer_reviews.text: I got this towel for hot yoga. I still slip when using it but it is better than just a plain yoga mat. The downside is the material is very thick. When washed and dried, everything sticks to it!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron C.

customer_reviews.title: First yoga towel! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been putting off buying a yoga towel simply because I thought I didn't need it. I typically used a regular bath towel on my mat during my hot yoga sessions. Finally, I decided to get one and see if it made any difference in my practice. I found Yoga Mate on Amazon and I couldn't have asked for a better product! It was soft, absorbent, and definitely kept me from slipping around on my mat due to all the sweat! So glad I purchased this towel. I recommend anyone practicing hot yoga to get one! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L

customer_reviews.title: This towel works as advertised. I have used many ...
customer_reviews.text: This towel works as advertised. I have used many a yoga towel for my hot yoga adventures and I not only place this mat on my mat during class but on my seat after class and although my seat gets a little damp from the sweat already accumulated, it still protects my car from being fully saturated.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Quality, affordable towel
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these towels, and they are my favorite towels for Bikram yoga, which I practice 4-6 times per week. The best part about them is the texture. Your feet do not slip on this towel even when they are wet with sweat! If you follow the care instructions, they also do not smell, even after close to a year of use which, let’s be honest, is a feat for anything used almost daily in 105 degree heat. I will buy another one of these towels when I am in need for a new yoga towel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for hot yoga
customer_reviews.text: This towel works perfectly to prevent slipping during hot yoga class! I use both the full mat towel and the hand towel - after several months with this towel, I put another, cheaper brand, so that i could constantly have a clean towel in rotation. And the other towel slips all over the mat when i'm trying to hold a pose! I exclusively use my Yoga Mate towel now! I've had it for over two years and it still washes up clean and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Towel
customer_reviews.text: This towel is dense enough and absorbent enough to mop up all my sweat during a tough class but lightweight enough that it doesn't weigh don my bag. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JD Dunkle

customer_reviews.title: ... this towel every time I do yoga and I love it. It stays on my mat really well ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this towel every time I do yoga and I love it. It stays on my mat really well and allows me not to slip at all. I had a lot of trouble slipping on my mat prior to purchasing this towel. It washes really well and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy camper
customer_reviews.text: The box which the item was delivered in had an offer code to receive a rebate on the towel. However once i went on the website to get the rebate it says the promo has ended. Dont send customers promo codes that do not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop searching and buy this towel!

I first purchased a cheaper towel that was literally falling apart during the class and was rubbing off on my toes giving me blisters. Thankfully I found this towel and I've had no problems! It is super soft and very absorbent making my practice comfortable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice grip to help me with my poses
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of those because my mat is a little slick so I would slide every time I was in down dog. I muster them down and they stay put on my mat. Nice grip to help me with my poses. I’ve used them for hot yoga and they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Strand

customer_reviews.title: Great towel!

This tile did a great job of absorbing my massive amount of sweat and stayed in place on the mat just as good as the expense of towels with the silicone grippers. I washed it with another towel and didn’t see any colors run either. Great product at a very reasonable price point and will definitely be ordering another one
customer_reviews.author: AZinMD

customer_reviews.title: Helps from slipping. Prefect size .

It’s the exact size of my yoga Matt so doesn’t get in my way and also doubles as extra padding well practicing on hard floors .
customer_reviews.author: Audio te

customer_reviews.title: Soft, non-slip, very absorbent
customer_reviews.text: I used this towel for hot yoga, and it works great! It held in place on my yoga mat, my hands never slipped, and it absorbed my sweat very well. This was a great purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Really slippery

customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Got towel for other type of workouts as well

customer_reviews.author: David Duhamel

customer_reviews.title: Love this towel, bring it to yoga

customer_reviews.author: Johnny Gannalo

customer_reviews.title: Great expectations

customer_reviews.author: Nick M. Atalla

customer_reviews.title: Does what you need.

customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my yoga towel

Bought one for myself and one for my mom. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Mate is the Master!

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Yoga towel is awesome for hot yoga

customer_reviews.title: Arguably a great yoga towel
